sentences.english: Bed thickness is analyzable until the bed thickness is vanishingly small.
sentences.chinese: 可分析的薄層厚度可以無限小，直至消失。

sentences.english: It is composed both of the infinitely great and the infinitely little.
sentences.chinese: 它是同時由無限大和無限小所構成的。
哪道題的商是無限小數？

sentences.english: The infinite redshift is an avatar of the unphysical assumption of infinitely small atoms.
sentences.chinese: 無限紅移只是無限小的原子這個非物理假設的化身。

sentences.english: You make the volume infinitely large, the density of the gas infinitely small.
sentences.chinese: 密度無限小，氣體分子之間的相互作用。

sentences.english: If you imagine that this guy is infinitely small then, really, the lengths become the same.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想象這是無限小的話，那長度也變成一樣了。
